prompt: Which of these relations is reflexive?
hint: Reflexive means every element relates to itself: ∀x R(x,x)
explanation: A relation R is reflexive if everything relates to itself: ∀x R(x,x). 'Is the same age as' is reflexive - everyone is the same age as themselves. 'Taller than', 'parent of', and 'different from' are all irreflexive - nothing stands in those relations to itself.
visual_concept: Reflexive: Every node has a loop pointing to itself. Like 'equals' - everything = itself.
